suggestedTasks.title: Implement Configuration Migration Utility for Agent Programs
suggestedTasks.description:
Create a robust migration script to automatically transform existing projects.json configurations into new agent program entries. The utility should:
- Parse existing configuration keys (model, claude_flags)
- Generate default Claude Code agent program entries
- Validate and preserve all current user settings
- Add migration tracking mechanism
Target location: /src/config/migration/agent_config_migrator.ts
suggestedTasks.reason: Needed to systematically convert existing configurations

suggestedTasks.title: Add Migration Status Tracking in User Interface
suggestedTasks.description:
Develop UI component to display configuration migration status and progress. Implement:
- Visual indicator for migration state (not started, in progress, completed)
- Optional manual migration trigger
- Logging of migration events and potential errors
Target location: /src/components/config/MigrationStatus.tsx
suggestedTasks.reason: Enhance user experience during configuration transition

patterns: Preserve existing configuration during system upgrades
gotchas: Ensure no data loss during configuration transformation

documentationNeeds: Update agent configuration migration process docs
